notes: After "Pork Chop," due to his bad health condition, Tad Doyle was unable to perform any longer, so Kurt Cobain replaced him on vocals.
Craig Montgomery played second guitar on at least "Ritual Device," it is possible he also played on "Sex God Missy" and "Wood Goblins."
The recorder model might have been a Grundig Beat Boy 380, but Legby UCR 1062 seems more likely.
recording.transferDetails: Nakamichi DR-3 > Schulz ADPS 1 > Fireface UC > Adobe Audition 3.0 > Trader's Little Helper 2.7.0
